Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Pisa (Tirrenia), Grand Hotel Continental is minutes from Tirrenia Beach and Cicliandia. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Luna Park and Sunlight Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 175 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and bidets. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Pisa (Tirrenia), Grand Hotel Continental is minutes from Tirrenia Beach and Cicliandia. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Luna Park and Sunlight Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tirrenia Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Cicliandia - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Luna Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Fantasilandia - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Parco Giochi Mattera Gian Carlo - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sunlight Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tirrenia Golf Club - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Golf and Country Club Cosmopolitan - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Marina di Pisa Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Pisa Marina - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Torre del Marzocco - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Basilica of San Piero a Grado - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Cimitero Greco-Ortodosso - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Mura Leopoldine - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi
Teatro San Marco - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Continental is Pisa (PSA-Galileo Galilei) - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
